name: Silly Stories
description:
Silly Stories is still in production. Silly stories is an interactive comics that will contains multiple different short comics (1 page) where I designed the engine, while the stories are written and drawn by Hoda Khalifa (my sister).

Right now the game only contains the following stories:

  • The Smack

Come back and check for more stories when they come out. Also, the interactive comics engine is going to be used for more elaborate comics with Cheesy Holes for one of the Deep Trilogy games called Deep Stories where the first story will be released very soon.

Stay tuned for more Silly Stories or Deep Stories in the near future.
